title: MOOC Design Process Analysis and Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platform usage and understanding of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Work-based learning environment structured around actual MOOC development cases. Practical training conducted in LMS environments similar to edX

learning_goals: Analyzing systemic conflict factors for each of the 5 stages of MOOC design (needs analysis, instructional design, production, implementation, evaluation)
Formulating optimal instructional design strategies under platform technical constraints
Proposing solutions to organizational structural issues arising during multidisciplinary team collaboration

resources: Access permissions to edX-based LMS system
MOOC case library across diverse academic disciplines
MOOC design templates and guideline documents

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
